channel.title: HKG:1299 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:1299 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AIA’s Hong Kong Sales Lift Profitability as Dividend Rises
item.description: AIA Group Ltd. reported strong growth in new business value in the first half of the year, underpinned by insurance sales in Hong Kong, as the firm hiked its dividend.

item.title: AIA’s Hong Kong Sales Lift Profitability as Dividend Rises
item.description: AIA Group Ltd. reported strong growth in new business value in the first half of the year, underpinned by insurance sales in Hong Kong, as the firm hiked its dividend.

item.title: Hong Kong Asks Insurers to Return Investing Roles From Singapore
item.description: Life insurers have become the latest target in Hong Kong’s efforts to compete with Singapore in retaining talent and capital.
